oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Assaults On Strikers Protested
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Strikes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Protestors surrounding Philadelphia's city hall. Second Panel: Sheriff deputizing hired toughs. Third Panel: UE protestors demonstrating outside a New Jersey court house.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
